name: DoughIO
body:
### Welcome to DoughIO.
This easy to use cost splitting service is currently under development.
Designed to settle bills without hassle, be it with your friends, flat mates or significant other.

To give some heads up, here's what we think:
* Forget about login, signup or download
* Non intrusive, no ads
* Open to a fault

***

There are several really great services for splitting costs out there but we just wanted something a little simpler for all the times when you don't want to have to tell all your friends to _sign up here_ or _download that_.
A service where a URL is all you need, a one stop shop micro service.

Please do [contribute](https://github.com/tolu/dough-io/fork), add requests or [issues](https://github.com/tolu/dough-io/issues)!

Toodles,

### Authors
Gabriel Ledung (@rexgnu)
Tobias Lundin (@tolu)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
